pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, August 18, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Montréal, Quebec

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver brief remarks prior to the Montréal Pride Parade.

Le Centre Sheraton Montréal Hotel
1201, boulevard René-Lévesque Ouest

 Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 11:15 a.m.

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Montréal Pride Parade.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive at Le Centre Sheraton Montréal Hotel no later than 11:15 a.m.
